Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory236.png'}
{3: 'Villier shows Qu the details on the mutiny. She watches as the number of casualties continues to escalate.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Villier', 3: "It seems that the attack on us a while ago was just a prelude. This time, he's raised his flags against us in direct opposition.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Where are they now?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'A large number of troops have gathered outside the city, and there was riot in the North City District. It appears that they sympathize with the mutiny.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1903.jpg'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: "Now's our chance.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'What do you mean?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'We can leave Kowloong forever, freeing ourselves from family quarrels and human struggles.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "You're right. Now's our chance...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "But I won't leave Kowloong.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'What do you mean?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'You and I both know what will happen if Brother takes the throne. The mutiny will create a river of blood as they slaughter the citizens that support us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "We can't let him do that.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: "The citizens... Why can't you drop the act this time?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: "It's sickening. I thought you understood me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: "I do understand. But I'm sorry, I was born to rule.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Protecting the citizens is my duty.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Hmph, do as you wish. I no longer concern myself with human affairs.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'I wish to join the Science Council and work on their "Gestalt" AI technology.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Okay. I wish you all the best.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: "Enough with the niceties. I can't stand all this social etiquette.", 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: "I do not know whether I made this decision out of everyone's expectation or out of my own free will."}
{3: 'But when I think about leaving Kowloong, a voice deep within my heart yells, "STOP!"'}
{3: "Because it's home to my comradesâ€”those that have what I lack. They are more perfect and beautiful than me."}
{3: 'So my duty is clear. I must protect them. I must protect the people of Kowloong.'}
